titles.title: To improve individual assistance provided by the Federal Emergency Management Agency, and for other purposes.
To improve individual assistance provided by the Federal Emergency Management Agency, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
